name: Afftra Blocks
author: Gutenbergkits

sections.description:
Afftra is a custom Gutenberg based block plugin developed with Gutenberg Native Components to show affiliate marketing related products.
Key Features
* Simple, light-weight, and fast
* Developed with Gutenberg Native Components
* Simple drag and drop using
* Highly Customizable
* Clean & smart customization panels
* No jQuery dependency
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/afftra-blocks directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->afftra-blocks screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
